entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 overnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill near minus 24. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight then periods of light snow. 30 percent chance of flurries over southern sections in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
